content: double duty dish scrubby pattern by in stitches materials 1 ball 3oz/85g red heart scrubby h 5 00mm hook stitch marker yarn needle gauge not important for this pattern each finished scrubby measures approximately 3 75 across you should be able to make 3 scrubbies out of one ball with this pattern stitches chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet bpsc - back post single_crochet blhdc - back loop half_double_crochet pattern instructions notes the beginning chain does not count as a stitch the first stitch is always performed in the same space as the beginning chain place a stitch marker in the first stitch to help identify where to join at the end of the round as the nature of the yarn makes it difficult to determine where stitches are located both sides of the scrubby are completed with continuous rounds attach yarn to hook with a slip knot and leave about 4-5 for a yarn tail chain 3 and slip_stitch to beginning chain to create a closed circle yarn tail should be slip stitched over round 1 - perform 6 half_double_crochet s into the circle created by the step above and around the yarn tail pull on yarn tail to close tight and then slip_stitch to first stitch to join 6 round 2 - ch2 2hdc into each stitch around slip_stitch to first stitch to join 12 round 3 - ch2 2hdc into each stitch around slip_stitch to first stitch to join 24 round 4 - ch2 2dc into same space as ch2 1hdc into next stitch repeat 2hdc half_double_crochet all around slip_stitch to first stitch to join 36 **the rounds will now be for the second side of the scrubby** double duty dish scrubby 1 of 2 copyright © 2018 in stitches crochet by sl round 5 - ch1 bpsc all around slip_stitch to first stitch to join 36 round 6 - ch2 blhdc all around slip_stitch to first stitch to join 36 round 7 - ch2 hdc2tog over first 2 stitches 1hdc into next stitch repeat hdc2tog half_double_crochet all around slip_stitch to first stitch to join 24 round 8 - ch2 hdc2tog over first 2 stitches hdc2tog over next 2 stitches 1hdc into next stitch repeat hdc2tog hdc2tog half_double_crochet all around slip_stitch to first stitch to join 15 round 9 - ch2 hdc2tog over first 2 stitches hdc2tog over next 2 stitches 1hdc into next stitch repeat hdc2tog hdc2tog half_double_crochet all around ending round with an half_double_crochet in the each of the last 2 stitches slip_stitch to first stitch to join 10 round 10 - ch2 hdc2tog all around before finishing the slip_stitch to join and close cut working yarn to leave about 4-5 for a yarn tail and then bring both the beginning yarn tail and working tail through stitch to finish the slip_stitch to join -
